Terms of Service

Last updated: August 26, 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using DealRadarUS ("we," "us," "our," or the "Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website located at dealradarus.com operated by DealRadarUS.

2. Use of Service

Permitted Use

You may use our service for lawful purposes only. You agree to use the service in a manner that does not:

  • Violate any applicable federal, state, local, or international law or regulation
  • Infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
  • Harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate
  • Submit false or misleading information
  • Upload viruses or other malicious code
  • Spam, phish, pharm, pretext, spider, crawl, or scrape

Account Responsibilities

While we do not require account creation for basic browsing, if you choose to subscribe to our newsletter or contact us, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any information you provide and for all activities that occur under your submission.

3. Content and Intellectual Property

Our Content

The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of DealRadarUS and its licensors. The service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws.

Deal Information

We aggregate deals from various retailers and sources. While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or availability of any deal, price, or promotion featured on our service.

User-Submitted Content

If you submit content to us (such as feedback, comments, or deal tips), you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and distribute such content in connection with our service.

4. Affiliate Disclosure and Marketing

DealRadarUS participates in affiliate marketing programs. This means we may earn commissions from purchases made through links on our site. Our affiliate relationships do not influence our editorial content or deal recommendations.

For complete details about our affiliate relationships and disclosure practices, please see our Affiliate Disclosure page.

5. Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Service, to understand our practices. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our Service.

6. Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability

Service Disclaimer

The information on this website is provided on an "as is" basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, this Company excludes all representations, warranties, conditions, and other terms which, but for this legal notice, might have effect in relation to our service.

Deal Accuracy

We are not responsible for the accuracy of deal information, pricing errors, product availability, or changes made by retailers after publication. Always verify current prices and availability directly with the retailer before making a purchase.

Limitation of Liability

In no event shall DealRadarUS, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of the Service.

7. External Links

Our Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by DealRadarUS. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party web sites or services.

You acknowledge and agree that DealRadarUS shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such web sites or services.

8. Termination

We may terminate or suspend your access immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately. If you wish to terminate your relationship with us, you may simply discontinue using the Service.

9. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

10. Governing Law

These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.

11. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

Email: deals@dealradarus.com
Website: https://dealradarus.com

We will respond to your inquiry within 2 business days.

Summary

These Terms of Service outline the rules and regulations for using DealRadarUS. By using our service, you agree to these terms. We provide deal aggregation services with affiliate marketing disclosures, and we're committed to transparency and user protection.

Key points: Use our service lawfully, respect intellectual property, understand our affiliate relationships, verify deals with retailers, and contact us at deals@dealradarus.com with questions.
